amendment.description: To require an annual report on the budgeting of the Department of Defense related to key military equipment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2563 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2563 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12789) To require an annual report on the budgeting of the Department of Defense related to key military equipment.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2563 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2563 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Feingold.
